subsection_content: Trichinosis is easily treated with many specific medications such as Praziquantel, Albendazole, Thiabendazole, and can last from 5-7 days. In addition, depending on the symptoms and sequelae left by trichinosis, patients are also given rehydration, electrolytes, fever-reducing drugs, even corticosteroids... to relieve pain and reduce inflammation.
subsection_title: giun xoan.json. How to treat trichinosis
subsection_data:
giun xoan.json. How to treat trichinosis
Trichinosis is easily treated with many specific medications such as Praziquantel, Albendazole, Thiabendazole, and can last from 5-7 days. In addition, depending on the symptoms and sequelae left by trichinosis, patients are also given rehydration, electrolytes, fever-reducing drugs, even corticosteroids... to relieve pain and reduce inflammation.
